title: Augmented Reality-Based Fuel Cell and Renewable Energy Literacy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Addressing the need for professionals to understand sustainable energy systems, with the goal of enhancing awareness of applicable technologies in daily life.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fuel cell operating principles and renewable energy system structures through 3D AR simulations
Learners can quantitatively analyze renewable energy's environmental/economic value through AR-based interactions
Learners can evaluate the practical applicability of fuel cell technology based on real-life scenarios (home/hospital/factory use cases) provided in mobile apps

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
